DOCNAME: CASE OF TIBERNEAC VASILE v. MOLDOVA
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in NORP .
CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant ’s parents were persecuted by the communist authorities . Their property was confiscated and they were exiled to LOC .
CARDINAL . NORP In DATE they were rehabilitated .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date in DATE the applicant brought an action against ORG , seeking compensation for the confiscation of his GPE property .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG ruled in favour of the applicant and ordered the defendant to pay him CARDINAL NORP lei ( MDL ) ( the equivalent of MONEY ( ORG ) at the time ) . The judgment was not appealed against and after DATE it became final and enforceable .
CARDINAL . On DATE a Bailiff received the enforcement warrant .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Bailiff sent the enforcement warrant to the President of GPE , without having enforced it .
CARDINAL . The judgment of DATE has not been enforced to date .

CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law was set out in GPE v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , ECHR CARDINALIII ( extracts ) ) and PERSON v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL ) , ( no . CARDINAL , § § CARDINAL - CARDINAL , DATE ) .
